sentences.en: And induced the feasibility of the PET fiber used to flocking by comparing the properties of the electrostatic flocking fabric of the nylon and terylene.
sentences.cn: 并就涤纶植绒织物与锦纶植绒织物进行比较，得出涤纶植绒织物与锦纶植绒织物性能相当。

sentences.en: Artificial materials, such as terylene, are now available.
sentences.cn: 已经能制造像涤纶这样的人造材料了.

sentences.en: The company supplies rayon embroidery threads, terylene profiled and - fixing embroidery threads, color threads and metallic yarn.
sentences.cn: 本公司现有人造丝绣花线及涤纶异形固色绣花线 、 七彩线、金银线等产品.

sentences.en: The company supplies rayon embroidery threads, terylene profiled-and-fixing embroidery threads, color threads and metallic yarn .
sentences.cn: 本公司现有人造丝绣花线及涤纶异形固色绣花线、七彩线、金银线等产品。

sentences.en: With a whole set of imported production equipment, the enterprise is capable of a fully in-the-house production from the terylene to finished zippers.
sentences.cn: 公司拥有全套拉链进口生产设备，从涤纶丝到成品拉链一条龙生产。

words.tran_cn: 涤纶（英国合成纤维之一，商标名）

trans.tran_en: a synthetic polyester fibre or fabric based on terephthalic acid, characterized by lightness and crease resistance and used for clothing, sheets, ropes, sails, etc
